questions.question: What is the primary text displayed prominently on the product, indicating its purpose?
Considering the layout, what specific dietary information is the product's label predominantly focused on?
In terms of units, how many servings are clearly stated to be included in a single container of this product?
Based on the label's specifications, what is the weight, in grams, of a single serving of this item?
What is the total caloric content, as numerically expressed, per serving of the food item?
According to the label, how many grams of total fat are present in a single serving of this product?
As per the nutrition facts, how many grams of total carbohydrates does one serving of this item contain?
Based on the listed nutritional information, how many grams of protein are found in a single serving?
What is the quantity, in milligrams, of sodium present in one serving, as indicated on the label?
According to the nutritional information provided, what is the amount of added sugars present per serving, in grams?
In milligrams, what is the amount of calcium listed per serving size according to the label?
In milligrams, what is the quantity of iron indicated on the product label for a single serving?
What is the background color of the majority of the label, providing a visual backdrop for the text?
Describe the overall textual style used for the major headings and numerical values on the label.
What is the overall shape of the product displayed in the image?
